tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE historic_outbreaks (
  outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  outbreak_name VARCHAR(255),
  outbreak_type VARCHAR(100),
  outbreak_date DATE,
  affected_area VARCHAR(1000),
  prevention_strategy TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PestOutbreaks (
    outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pest_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    outbreak_date DATE,
    detection_method VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE DiseaseOutbreaks (
    outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    outbreak_date DATE,
    prevention_strategy TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE pest_outbreaks (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pest_type VARCHAR(255),
  outbreak_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE disease_outbreaks (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_type VARCHAR(255),
  outbreak_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE prevention_strategies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pest_or_disease VARCHAR(255),
  strategy_type VARCHAR(255),
  implementation_date DATE,
  effectiveness_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE pest_outbreaks (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pest_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  outbreak_date DATE,
  affected_area VARCHAR(100),
  detection_method VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE disease_outbreaks (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  outbreak_date DATE,
  affected_population INT,
  prevention_strategy TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE outbreak_locations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  country VARCHAR(50),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  longitude DECIMAL(10, 6)
)

CREATE TABLE outbreak_records (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  outbreak_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  outbreak_id INT,
  reported_date DATE,
  reported_by VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE historic_pest_outbreaks (
  outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pest_name TEXT,
  outbreak_date DATE,
  affected_area TEXT,
  detection_method TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE historic_disease_outbreaks (
  outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name TEXT,
  outbreak_date DATE,
  affected_area TEXT,
  detection_method TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE prevention_strategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name TEXT,
  target_pest_or_disease TEXT,
  effectiveness_rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE affected_population (
  population_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  population_type TEXT,
  affected_area TEXT,
  outbreak_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (outbreak_id) REFERENCES historic_pest_outbreaks(outbreak_id)
)

CREATE TABLE detection_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  detection_date DATE,
  detection_method TEXT,
  result TEXT,
  outbreak_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (outbreak_id) REFERENCES historic_pest_outbreaks(outbreak_id)
)
